Legiones Astartes.warning: This army's primary detachment is the Crusade Primary Detachment and must be selected.

Legiones Astartes Apex Detachment.warning: A Master of the Legion is required to select an Apex Detachment.

Legiones Astartes Auxillary Detachment.warning: A Command sub-type model is required to select an Auxillary Detachment.
